description: Identification and prioritization of “environmental hotspots” in Albania

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacity of national institutions to manage the environment, protect cultural heritage and regulate economic policies.
subproject.description:
1.Environmental Assessments for the environmental hotspots developed 
Supporting the development of a comprehensive inventory of environmental hotspots
Developing sites analysis (environmental assessments) for the identified hotspots
2.EIA  for priority hotspots and outlines for short-term emergency risk reduction intervention prepared  
Prioritization of the identified hotspots, EIAs conducted short term emergency intervention plans prepared accordingly
3.Action plans for the remediation of environmental hotspots prepared
Prepare and disseminate the Action Plans for hotspots remediation to relevant stakeholders and to the general public;
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
